Room.Name: Dark Tempest Over Castle Kayleigh
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a swirling dark tempest over the burned Castle Kayleigh.
Room.LongDescription: From this height you can see that only a single turreted tower remains standing in the fire-blackened ruin. However, the stone deck of the tower looks quite sturdy, and big enough for the copper dragon to land. Odd, but there's not a tree or bush within a mile of the old castle. The moat is still there, but the drawbridge burned away long ago. Looks like the only entrance is by air.
